div.bibl: El Nacional, Apr. 11, 1931. DANCE FOR TO-DAY

body.p: As we have mentioned repeatedly in other editions, a grand benefit ball, will take place to-day at the Chicago University Settlement House. This dance has been organized by the Cultural and Necaka Clubs of this city, which will also give a royal morning festival at the same location, in which the best of our Mexican artists will take part.

These two evenings of entertainment are the results of preparations over a longs period of time. Indeed, the organizations were determined, to omit no detail which would detract in importance from this benefit, given for the Chicago University Settlement.
